title: Hisui no Tameiki
sinopse:
A collection of short stories about life of an extravagant lord who is a writer and his servant-boy.

1. Gin no Wa
2. Suishou no Niwa
3. Kokuyouseki no Yoru
4. Hoshi no Tengai
5. Suigyoku no Mori
6. Niji no Kairou
7. Night mare
8. Vanstein-kyou no Oshigoto
9. Gekkou no Shizuku
10. Kinryokuseki no Shouyou
    11-12. Hisui no Tameiki
11. Hanakage Yawa
